document_data.name: Ak'hafta
document_data.text: ''Twinkle came in point first, slicing through the doomed drow's backbone and heart, driving out the front of his chest, the blade's blue glow showing a reddish tint.''
document_data.mainbody:
===Legacy of Ak'hafta===
After his death, Drizzt shot Artemis Entreri with Ak'hafta's [[hand crossbow]] while clinging to a cliff in Mithral Hall, after Artemis revealed he had a ''[[cloak of the bat]]'' which saved him from falling to his death. The powerful [[drow]] [[poison]] caused Entreri to fly into a mountain face after he lost control of his magical cloak.
